Description_lang: Binds a target to a location, snaring by $209011s2% and inflicting $206339s1 Fire damage every half-second. When broken, the bond explodes for $206340s1 Fire damage to targets within $206340A1 yards of the bound target, divided evenly amongst targets hit.
AuraDescription_lang: Explodes for $206340s1 Fire damage when broken.Suffering increasing Fire damage every half-second.Movement speed decreased by $209011s2%.
